DataListSpec.Name: FOODBANKTXHEADER Data List LHOLT
DataListSpec.Description: Returns all Food Bank Transaction Header records for a given food bank.
DataListSpec.Author: Technical Training
DataListSpec.common:SecurityUIFolder: Constituent\Food Bank LHOLT\Food Bank Transaction Header

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USP_DATALIST_FOODBANKTXHEADER_LHOLT ( @FOODBANKID uniqueidentifier ,@TOTALAMOUNT money = null , @MAXROWS integer ) as set nocount on;
SELECT TOP(@MAXROWS) dbo.USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER_LHOLT.ID , dbo.USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER_LHOLT.TXDATE , dbo.CONSTITUENT.NAME as CONSTITUENTNAME , dbo.USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER_LHOLT.FOODBANKTXTYPE , dbo.USR_UFN_FOODBANKTXFOODITEMAMT_LHOLT(dbo.USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER_LHOLT.ID) AS TOTALAMOUNT , dbo.USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER_LHOLT.RECEIPTPRINTED FROM dbo.USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER_LHOLT INNER JOIN dbo.CONSTITUENT ON dbo.USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER_LHOLT.CONSTITUENTID = dbo.CONSTITUENT.ID WHERE dbo.USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER_LHOLT.FOODBANKID = @FOODBANKID AND (@TOTALAMOUNT is null or dbo.USR_UFN_FOODBANKTXFOODITEMAMT_LHOLT(dbo.USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER_LHOLT.ID) > @TOTALAMOUNT ) ORDER BY dbo.USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER_LHOLT.TXDATE, dbo.CONSTITUENT.NAME
